video_prompt: Long, blue hair gently sways to the right. Her eyes subtly blink while her chest rises and falls with a soft breath. The small white flowers by her feet sway in the breeze. refined_video_prompt: Blue hair sways right. Eyes subtly blink. Chest rises and falls with breath. Small white flowers sway gently. Subtle light shimmer moves across skin and clothes. Soft light flares emanate from the background.
creative_video_prompt_1: Her long blue hair whips violently to the right, electricity arcing along the strands. Eyes flash open with intense, glowing energy, radiating power. Her chest heaves as an explosive pulse of raw elemental force erupts outwards, tearing through the small white flowers at her feet, sending petals spinning into a vortex. A searing light engulfs the background, morphing into swirling nebulae as unseen forces rage. Lightning bolts strike, causing dramatic transformations and a rapid, frenzied dance of light and shadow across her form.
creative_video_prompt_2: Her cerulean hair, now living tendrils, unfurls upward, defying gravity, each strand morphing into glowing liquid. Her eyes, instead of blinking, dissolve into shimmering nebulae, reforming as constellations. Her chest pulsates, releasing ethereal birds that transform into musical notes. The white flowers, roots detaching, twist into luminous geometric solids, then re-plant themselves upside down. A chromatic aurora bleeds from her skin, flowing like molten glass, while background lights warp into spiraling vortexes, sucking in and regurgitating fragments of reality.
creative_video_prompt_3: A slow, sweeping camera track opens on her serene face, followed by a dramatic close-up as her eyes slowly open, revealing shimmering violet. A subtle breeze rustles her long blue hair and the field of white flowers. The camera gracefully pulls back and descends, revealing her full form as soft light flares bloom from behind trees, culminating in a cinematic, low-angle shot as she raises her hand, a lone blue petal landing gently in her palm. Her chest expands in a deep, cinematic breath as the flowers bloom around her.
